messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for tax-related inquiries.
How does location affect the tax charged on my recharge or usage?
What role does my location play in the taxes charged on my phone usage?
Can my location change the amount of tax I pay on my Telenor account?

Tax will be charged based upon the location of the tower from where the customer is catching signals. Customers at the boundary of a region may be charged differently in this scenario irrespective of their own physical location. If a customer recharges via EasyLoad and their phone is off, then location will not be available for such customer and a default tax of 12.5% WHT and 19.5% FED will be charged.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for tax-related inquiries.
Will regional based taxation apply on any bundles?
Does regional taxation affect bundle prices?
Are bundles subject to regional tax variations?
No, regional taxation is only applied on non-bundle Voice & SMS on the basis of usage.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for tax-related inquiries.
How will the network identify customer’s region?
What method does the network use to determine my region for taxation?
How does Telenor figure out which region I am in for tax purposes?
Network would identify customer’s region through the tower from where the customer is catching signals.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for tax-related inquiries.
What is region based taxation?
Could you explain what region based taxation means?
What does region based taxation entail at Telenor?

Region based taxation means the ratio of FED on voice calls & SMS and WHT (Advance Income Tax) on recharge would be according to the customer’s region from where the call/SMS is initiated or recharge is made.
